thread.title: China and Russia are using hacked data to target U.S. spies, officials say
thread.title_full: China and Russia are using hacked data to target U.S. spies, officials say

title: China and Russia are using hacked data to target U.S. spies, officials say
text:
31 China and Russia are using hacked data to target U.S. spies, officials say 
Los Angeles Times: Foreign spy services, especially in China and Russia, are aggressively aggregating and cross-indexing hacked U.S. computer databases — including security clearance applications, airline records and medical insurance forms — to identify U.S. intelligence officers and agents, U.S. officials said.
